The command parser to use for syntax checking.

member.summary: Handles the click event of button1. Saves program commands to a text file.

member.summary: Handles the text changed event of textBox3. Updates the program commands list associated with program 2.

member.summary: Handles the click event of button2. Loads program commands from a text file.

member.summary: Handles the click event of button3. Adds a command to both program 1 and program 2.

member.name: M:AdvancedSoftwareEngineeringPart2.MainForm.button4_Click_1(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the click event of button4. Performs syntax check for both programs.

member.summary: Handles the click event of RunButton. Executes the programs in separate threads.

The command parser to use for execution.
